channel.title: Audiophools on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Audiophools on Simba Tango

item.title: Audio Myths
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Now, this may be only remotely relevant to tango, but tango music and hence its reproduction is important for dancers and djs in particular, so here it goes. I think the lessons from this video are most relevant when it comes to making decisions about equipment such as sound cards for djing, lossless versus lossy encoding of music and quality of transfers and restorations. If you hang out at hydrogenaudio, this will all be familiar, but I have to say actually performing an abx was a humbling experience with regards to what I can and can’t hear.
